description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              -	Perform test activities such as test execution, capturing and analysing test results and raising & tracking defects
              
              -	Develop test procedures based on tests designed according to requirements
              
              -	Maintaining existing test artefacts
              
              -	Prepare Test Data as required
              
              -	Document and produce daily activities report
              
              -	Coordinate and liaise with relevant parties for project related items
              
              -	Maintain relationship with project team as well as with clients
              
              -	Participate in team meetings
              

              Working conditions
              
              -	Time: 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM
              
              -	Venue: 170D/2A Phan Dang Luu, Ward 3, Phu Nhuan District , HCMC.
              

              Application
              
              -	The sooner the better
              
              -	English CV required
              
              -	CVs with photograph preferred
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              -	1– 2 years of IT experience, especially in the field of Software Quality Assurance is preferred or internship experience within the domain
              
              -	Ability to communicate in good English (Spoken & Written)
              
              -	Proficient in MS Excel, Word and PowerPoint
              
              -	Good oral and written communication skills
              
              -	Ability to work in fast paced and challenging environment
              
              -	Must be a team player as well as able to work independently
              
              -	Strong analytical skills. People-oriented
              
              -	Commitment to quality, attention to detail
              
              -	Good time keeper, person of integrity
              
              -	Ability to work under pressure and under strict deadlines
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                -	Competitive salary + 13th payment + additional performance bonus
               







                -	Coaching, training and opportunities to work overseas
               







                -	12 annual leave days + 10 full paid sick leave days + 2 company trips/year + Health Insurance
